original_text: And it came to pass, when our enemies heard that it was known unto us, and God had brought their counsel to nought, that we returned all of us to the wall, every one unto his work.
korean_text: 우리의 대적이 우리가 그들의 의도를 눈치챘다 함을 들으니라 하나님이 그들의 꾀를 폐하셨으므로 우리가 다 성에 돌아와서 각각 일하였는데

sentences.original_text: that it was known unto us
and God had brought their counsel to nought
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님이 그들의 계획을 무력하게 하셨다는 것을

sentences.original_text: that we returned all of us to the wall
